# Gini
`r stringi::stri_rand_lipsum(2)`


`r stringi::stri_rand_lipsum(1)`

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(povcalnetR)
library(crosstalk)
library(plotly)

df <- povcalnet()
df <- df %>% 
  select(countrycode, countryname, year, gini) %>% 
  mutate(
    text = paste("Country:\t",   countryname, "\n",
                 "year:\t\t\t\t", year, "\n",
                 "Gini:\t\t\t\t", round(gini, digits = 3), "\n")
  )

sh_df <- SharedData$new(df)

gg <- ggplot(sh_df, 
             aes(x = year, 
                 y = gini, 
                 color = countryname, 
                 group = countryname)
) +
  geom_point(aes(text = text)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_minimal() + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")

bscols(
  widths = 12,
  filter_select(id         = "id", 
                label      = "Select Country", 
                sharedData = sh_df, 
                group      = ~countryname),
  ggplotly(gg, tooltip = "text") 
)

```
